languages.text: "Сговорились? О нет. Никакого договора не было — она лишь летела на приманку. Изначально я планировал использовать того, кому ты доверял{mf||а} — обожженного мон-кай, с которым мы провели долгие, долгие часы в ожидании тебя. Однако моя кузина оказалась весьма проворна — позже она выследила мон-кай, убила его и забрала у него переговорное устройство, которое он использовал, чтобы связаться со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Сговорились? О нет. Никакого договора не было — она лишь летела на приманку. Изначально я планировал использовать того, кому ты доверял{mf||а} — обожженного мон-кай, с которым мы провели долгие, долгие часы в ожидании тебя. Однако моя кузина оказалась весьма проворна — позже она выследила мон-кай, убила его и забрала у него переговорное устройство, которое он использовал, чтобы связаться со мной".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."
languages.original_text: "Сговорились? О нет. Никакого договора не было — она лишь летела на приманку. Изначально я планировал использовать того, кому ты доверял{mf||а} — обожженного мон-кай, с которым мы провели долгие, долгие часы в ожидании тебя. Однако моя кузина оказалась весьма проворна — позже она выследила мон-кай, убила его и забрала у него переговорное устройство, которое он использовал, чтобы связаться со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Conspirando? No, no. No había ningún complot entre nosotros... simplemente se abalanzó sobre mi cebo. Al principio, pensé en usar a tu agente de confianza, el mon-keigh quemado con quien habíamos esperado tu llegada durante largas horas. Pero mi prima fue muy rápida. Dio caza al mon-keigh, lo mató y le arrebató el dispositivo que usaba para contactar conmigo».
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Conspirando? No, no. No había ningún complot entre nosotros... simplemente se abalanzó sobre mi cebo. Al principio, pensé en usar a tu agente de confianza, el mon-keigh quemado con quien habíamos esperado tu llegada durante largas horas. Pero mi prima fue muy rápida. Dio caza al mon-keigh, lo mató y le arrebató el dispositivo que usaba para contactar conmigo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “勾结？不，不，我们之间并没有什么勾结，只是她咬了我的钩罢了。一开始，我本打算利用那只烧坏了脸的猴子。你很信任他，而在你赶到之前，我们两人已经独处了相当长的一段时间。不过，我的表妹动作很快。她发现了那个猴子的背叛行为，杀了他，夺走了用来和我取得联系的装置。”
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: “勾结？不，不，我们之间并没有什么勾结，只是她咬了我的钩罢了。一开始，我本打算利用那只烧坏了脸的猴子。你很信任他，而在你赶到之前，我们两人已经独处了相当长的一段时间。不过，我的表妹动作很快。她发现了那个猴子的背叛行为，杀了他，夺走了用来和我取得联系的装置。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「陰謀？いやいや、我々の中に陰謀などない。彼女は単に俺のエサに飛びついただけだ。最初は、お前の信頼する者に任せる予定だった…長い間、お前の到着を共に待った火傷を負ったモン＝ケイをな。だが俺のいとこの動きは早く、彼女はモン＝ケイを追い詰めて殺し、彼が俺に連絡するために使用していた装置を奪ってしまった」
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: 「陰謀？いやいや、我々の中に陰謀などない。彼女は単に俺のエサに飛びついただけだ。最初は、お前の信頼する者に任せる予定だった…長い間、お前の到着を共に待った火傷を負ったモン＝ケイをな。だが俺のいとこの動きは早く、彼女はモン＝ケイを追い詰めて殺し、彼が俺に連絡するために使用していた装置を奪ってしまった」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Une conspiration ? Détrompez-vous. Il n'existe aucune collusion entre nous, elle n'a fait que mordre à l'hameçon que je lui ai tendu. Au départ, je comptais me servir de votre homme de confiance, ce mon-keigh brûlé avec qui j'ai passé de longues, longues heures en attendant votre arrivée, mais ma cousine m'a coupé l'herbe sous le pied. Elle a retrouvé sa trace avant de le tuer et de prendre l'appareil qu'il avait utilisé pour me contacter. »
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: « Une conspiration ? Détrompez-vous. Il n'existe aucune collusion entre nous, elle n'a fait que mordre à l'hameçon que je lui ai tendu. Au départ, je comptais me servir de votre homme de confiance, ce mon-keigh brûlé avec qui j'ai passé de longues, longues heures en attendant votre arrivée, mais ma cousine m'a coupé l'herbe sous le pied. Elle a retrouvé sa trace avant de le tuer et de prendre l'appareil qu'il avait utilisé pour me contacter. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Verschworen? Nein, nein. Es gab keine Intrige zwischen uns — sie hat lediglich meinen Köder geschluckt. Zunächst wollte ich den Mann nutzen, dem Ihr vertraut — den verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey, mit dem wir lange, lange Stunden auf Eure Ankunft gewartet hatten. Doch meine Base war so schnell. Sie hat hinterher den Chem-Pan-Sey aufgespürt und getötet und das Gerät an sich genommen, über das er mich kontaktiert hatte."
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: "Verschworen? Nein, nein. Es gab keine Intrige zwischen uns — sie hat lediglich meinen Köder geschluckt. Zunächst wollte ich den Mann nutzen, dem Ihr vertraut — den verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey, mit dem wir lange, lange Stunden auf Eure Ankunft gewartet hatten. Doch meine Base war so schnell. Sie hat hinterher den Chem-Pan-Sey aufgespürt und getötet und das Gerät an sich genommen, über das er mich kontaktiert hatte."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

languages.text: "Kumpas mı? Yok canım... Öyle karşılıklı bir planımız olmadı. Attığım yemi yuttu desek daha doğru olur. Zaten ilk... O güvendiğin yanık mon-keigh'i kullanacaktım. Sen geleceksin diye saatlerce bekledik. Gerçi soydaşım epey hızlı çıktı. Mon-keigh'i buldu, öldürdü, benimle iletişim için kullandığı cihazı aldı."
languages.original_text: "Conspiring? No, no. There was no plot between us — she merely rushed to my bait. At first, I planned to use the one you trusted — the burned mon-keigh with whom we had spent long, long hours awaiting your arrival. But my cousin was so swift — afterward, she tracked down the mon-keigh, killed him, and took the device that he had been using to contact me."

traits.locale_text: "Kumpas mı? Yok canım... Öyle karşılıklı bir planımız olmadı. Attığım yemi yuttu, desek daha doğru. Zaten ilk... O güvendiğin yanık mon-keigh'i kullanacaktım. Sen geleceksin diye saatlerce bekledik. Gerçi soydaşım epey hızlı çıktı. Mon-keigh'i buldu, öldürdü, benimle iletişim için kullandığı cihazı aldı."
